Title: The Sign of Four
Writer: Arthur Conan Doyle (by), John Hawkesworth (dramatised by)
Actors: Jeremy Brett, Edward Hardwicke, Robin Hunter, Alf Joint
Plot: A young lady, Miss Mary Morstan, contact Sherlock Holmes for his help regarding her father, captain Morstan, who disappeared 10 years ago. Since his disappearance she annually receives a valuable pearl by post from an unknown person. The mystery leads Holmes and doctor Watson into an intricate plot regarding a lost treasure belonging to four convicts on the Andaman Islands.
